track.name: Sun & Ice
comments: sounds for the fast lane at 2am..
That rhythmic noise that comes in after the glitch is so perfect. It's like leftover static discharge.
Great energy on this one.  Gets me goin'!
yeah it does sound like it. Haven't listen to I Robot since I was about 14
pretty sure this song samples Nucleus by The Alan Parsons Project
This song made me start playing unreal tournament again. It's just full of nostalgia.
I cannot get enough of this kind of beautiful music.
one dayy we're gonna live in parrrrissss
He recorded this track live and the glitch was in fact a glitch. He messed up, but whatever it still sounds amazing.
Seems like 4:45 was intentional to me. It totally fits the song.
Oh my fuck. Nearly five months and I have finally found you again you sneaky shit. xoxo
Nevermind…I found the info I was looking for. Friendly Fires did in fact sample this track (with permission).
